kid_name_question: Ποιό είναι το όνομα του παιδιού σας;

parent_deleted_kid: it seems your child no longer has a user account
phone_number_exists: This number/mail is already in use

we_get_info_from_prisjakt: We collect all product information from

chore_always_available_desc: Για τις μικροεργασίες που θέλεις να γίνονται καθημερινά!
verification_failed_text: The verification of your phone number or email failed. Try again or contact support.
code_verification_failed: we were unable to verify the code. Check that you entered the correct code.
signin_error_text: Something went wrong when you tried to log in. Check your Internet connection and try again.
signin_link_invalid_text: The login link is not active any more. Try to log in again.
signin_link_error_text: Something went wrong when you tried to log in. Check your Internet connection and try again.
email_already_in_use: This email address is already registered
missing_camera_desc: Without access to the camera, you can't take a picture
one_time_only_desc: Μπορεί να ολοκληρωθεί μόνο μία φορά
upgraded_to_premium: you've been upgraded to Superskills Pro!
dream_achieved_desc: the goal will be here until you archive it.
nothing_to_see_here: Δεν υπάρχει κάτι προς το παρόν εδω…
delete_connection_sure: are you sure you want to delete %1$d?

Δεν υπάρχουν επαφές ακόμα!

error_could_not_complete_connection: The contact could not be added!
error_could_not_complete_connection_desc: You can't connect with another parent. But you can invite them to connect with your children.
max_characters: Χρειάζεστε περισσότερους από %1$d χαρακτήρες; Προσθέστε περισσότερο περιεχόμενο στη περιγραφή αργότερα!

sms_invite_description: Περίμενε... ένα SMS είναι καθ' οδόν
old_reverted_allowance_transaction: Balance adjustment due to deleted contact
request_permission_title_camera: Permission to access the camera required
request_permission_camera: The app uses the camera so that you can add chore pictures, scan the QR code and for profile pictures.
request_permission_title_notification: Give Gimi permission to send pushes!
request_permission_notifications: Gimi needs permission to send you push notifications. Update this in your settings!
revoke_permission_title: Σίγουρα θέλετε να το κάνετε αυτό;
request_permission_photo: The app requests access to the gallery so that you can add picures to goals and chores, and update your profile picture
request_permission_title_photo: The app doesn't have persmission to access the gallery
revoke_permission_camera: Είστε βέβαιοι ότι θέλετε να ανακαλέσετε την πρόσβαση στην κάμερα;
revoke_permission_photo: Είστε βέβαιοι ότι θέλετε να ανακαλέσετε την πρόσβαση στη συλλογή
revoke_permission_notifications: Είστε βέβαιοι ότι δεν θέλετε ειδοποιήσεις push; Δεν θα μπορούμε να σας ειδοποιούμε για σημαντικά γεγονότα!
email_invite_description: Check your email for the code. Sometimes emails can be slow, and this one often ends up in junk!
delete_connection_warning_for_kid: The money that %1$d owes you will disappear from your demo account. Are you sure you want to delete %1$d
delete_connection_warning_for_parent: The money that you owe %1$d will disappear from the demo account. Are you sure you want to delete %1$d?
why_we_ask_for_phone: Γιατί πρέπει να προσθέσετε αριθμό ή email
explainer_why_phone_title: We created Gimi for the children
explainer_why_phone_desc: For your child to be able to use Gimi, they need to login to this account you're creating with a unique phone number or email.
explainer_why_block_1_title: What %1$d can do on their account in Gimi
explainer_why_block_1_desc: The child view in the Gimi app is different from what you as a parent see. Your child will be able to view their bank account balance, create a savings goal, suggest chores, learn about money in the Superskills Adventure, and more educational features.
explainer_why_block_2_desc: We suggest to create an email for your child, or use the email or a phone number of a family member that doesn’t use Gimi. Gimi can be downloaded on both phones and tablets.
accept_email_contact: Yes, you can contact me over email
error_message_exeded_min_savings_amount: You have exeded the mininuum savings amount
kid_dream_achived_desc: Congratulate %1$d on the achievement and keep encouraging saving!
delete_recurring_popover_title: You sure you want to delete %1$d?
delete_recurring_popover_text: This means deleting it on all its active days, as well as all completed chores. It will also deduct the money previously earned through this chore from Payday. If you only want to change the frequency, go to chore settings!
payday_takeover_multiple_parents_info: %1$d has other connections. You can see what they pay in the transaction list.
payday_takeover_subtitle_parent_weekly: Your weekly allowance has been added to the demo account.
payday_takeover_subtitle_parent_monthly: Your monthly allowance has been added to the demo account.
payout_in_cash_popover_title: Sure you want to payout in cash?
payout_in_cash_popover_text: The money has already been added to the demo account. By doing a cash payout, the money is deducted from savings.
server_error_popover_desc: ...But we will be back gain really soon! We hope to see you again in a few minutes.
chore_cant_be_completed_popover_title: This chore cannot be completed yet!
chore_cant_be_completed_popover_text: This chore is not due yet, so you can't complete it today. Come back later!
confirmation_message_number_verified: Your number has been sucessfully verified
cash_payout_withdraw_popover_text: %1$d was deducted from the demo account.
added_dream_without_parent_takeover_text: But you need a parent to get money for your goal!
cant_delete_premium_kid_popover_text: You have an active Superskills Pro subscription, so you cannot delete this connection.

currency_picker_subtitle: changes will affect all your connected children
cant_change_currency_for_kid_w_multiple_: %1$d has other connections that would be affected.
add_goal_image_title: Πρόσθεσε μια εικόνα του στόχου σου!
connected_to_parent_takeover_title: Έχεις συνδεθεί με τον γονέα σου!
your_subscription_cancelled_subtitle: You can keep using Gimi, but some of your functions have now been limited.
already_active_dream_popover_text: If you want to make this your goal, you first need to delete your current goal.
today_is_pay_day_subtitle: %1$d was added to your demo account.
phone_verification_sent_to_kid_phone: A verification code has been sent to your child’s new phone number
keep_dream_active_question_popover_title: Want to keep your goal here?
keep_dream_active_question_popover_text: If you already bought it and want to start saving for something new, you can archive it.
parent_connect_to_all_kids_header: You can't connect with other adults
parent_connect_to_all_kids_desc: You can send an invite, and once signed up they can connect to your children.
cant_delete_email_no_phone_popover_text: You need a verified phone number to delete your email, or you won't be able to log in.
existing_connection_popover_title: You're already connected to this user

slow_code_message: Wait for it... the delay can be up to 5 minutes!
name_has_existing_connection_popover_tit: You're already connected to this user
no_convert_currency_popover_desc: We will just change the currency, but the amounts will stay the same.
auto_approve_chore_popover_text: This chore will be automatically approved 24 hours after completion. You can’t undo approved chores.
maintenance_subtitle: ...but we'll be back up again really soon! We hope to see you again in a few minutes.
using_hotmail_outlook_warning: Using Hotmail and Outlook? Sorry, but your email provider is blocking our emails.
itunes_disclaimer: All subscriptions are automatically renewed and charged to your Apple ID account within 24 hours prior to the end of the billing period. Manage or cancel your subscriptions in your App Store account settings. For more information, please see our terms of service and privacy policy.
iap_general_error: Someting went wrong! Seems we can't show you the subscription options
iap_no_products_for_you: You've maxed out your subscriptions - we don't have any more to offer you!
general_scan_me: Σκανάρετε τον κωδικό QR με την κάμερα του κινητού σας
confirm_delete_chore_popover_title: Sure you want to delete this chore?
confirm_delete_chore_popover_text: You will not be able to undo this, this chore will be forever deleted!
qr_code_explainer_popover_subtitle: Either user can show the code on their phone for the other user to scan. Both the QR-code and the scanner can be found in settings under my contacts or using the invite-button.

request_permission_contacts: It makes it easier to invite your family!

kid_downgraded_takeover_not_main_parent_: We have cancelled your Superskills Pro subscription, but you can keep using the free Beginner app!
too_many_premium_deposits_popover_text: There's a limit of 10 deposits per day and person.

connection_error_desc_popover: Seems you are offline! Try again when you get online.

chores_to_do_parent_status_message_empty: Δεν υπάρχει κάτι εδώ. Θα θέλατε να δώσετε στο παιδί σας μια νέα μικροεργασία;
chores_pending_parent_status_message_emp: Δεν υπάρχει κάτι για έγκριση αυτη τη στιγμή. Θα θέλατε να δώσετε στο παιδί σας μια νέα μικροεργασία;
chores_done_parent_status_message_empty: Δεν υπάρχουν εγκεκριμένες δουλειές για αυτή την εβδομάδα!
chores_to_do_kid_without_parent: Μπορείς να κάνεις μικροεργασίες για να κερδίζεις περισσότερα χρήματα, αλλά πρώτα χρειάζεσαι έναν γονέα που πρέπει να τις εγκρίνει. Προσκάλεσε έναν!!
chores_to_do_first_time_kid_with_parent: Το να κάνεις μικροεργασίες ισούται με περισσότερα χρήματα. Μπορείς να προτείνεις μια μικροεργασία στους γονείς σου ή να τους ζητήσεις να δημιουργήσουν εκείνοι μία για σένα.
chores_pending_first_time_kid_with_paren: Once you've completed a chore, it will stay here until it's approved by a parent.
chores_done_first_time_kid_with_parent: When the chores are approved, they'll end up here. The amount you've earned is added to your next allowance payout.
chores_to_do_first_time_parent: Doing chores is necessary to understand the concept of earning money. Add a chore to get started!
chores_to_approve_empty_state: Once %1$d has completed a chore, it's sent here for approval by you.
chores_done_first_time_parent: The earned amount will be automatically added to the next allowance payout. We'll do the counting!
chore_sent_for_approval_from_rejected: Nice! Hope it gets approved this time.

sign_up_choose_account_type_do_chores: Κάνω μικροεργασίες για να λάβω επιπλέον χρήματα
sign_up_choose_account_type_support: Υποστηρίζω το οικονομικό ταξίδι του παιδιού μου
sign_up_age_explanation: O λόγος που ρωτάμε είναι για να μπορέσουμε να σου δώσουμε έξυπνες προτάσεις με βάση την ηλικία σου!
paywall_title: Make more sense of money with Superskills Pro!
paywall_read_more_connect_bank_descripti: Keep track of your child’s balance and transactions in the same place as you manage the allowance. We categorize all their transactions and you will get a spending summary each week. *It currently works for %1$d.
paywall_read_more_savings_goal_descripti: Learning to save is a lesson for life, and visualizing a savings goal makes everything easier. Our research shows that children who save for something manage their money better, which makes this one of the most important features of the Gimi app.
paywall_read_more_finance_lessons_descri: Give your child access to 40+ fun lessons and challenges on personal finance topics. The feature is developed by experts in didactics and includes all the basics your child needs to make more sense of money.
paywall_read_more_family_missions_descri: Build strong financial habits with 16+ exercises that you can bring into the everyday life of your family. Organizing a garage sale and budgeting for a family trip are two of many things you can practise with your child!
paywall_read_more_savings_bonus_descript: Encourage your child to save money by adding a savings bonus. The bonus will be paid out together with the allowance and calculated as a % of the savings amount.
setup_open_banking_bullet_1: You as a parent will be authenticated through your bank
setup_open_banking_bullet_2: Select the child’s bank account from the list of accounts
setup_open_banking_bullet_3: Start your free trial of Superskills Pro
setup_open_banking_bullet_4: Done! Now you and your child can use Gimi with their bank account
onboarding_piggybank_information_1: Με τον λογαριασμό Gimi, ακολουθείτε τις κινήσεις των χρημάτων του παιδιού σας και λειτουργεί σαν μια απλή αριθμομηχανή
onboarding_piggybank_information_3: Όταν το παιδί σας θέλει να αγοράσει κάτι με τα χρήματα του λογαριασμού Gimi, πληρώνετε και αφαιρείτε τα “χρήματα” από τον λογαριασμό Gimi ανάλογα.
onboarding_piggybank_information_4_1: Ο λογαριασμός Gimi είναι για εξάσκηση!
onboarding_piggybank_information_4_2: Ο λογαριασμός Gimi είναι για εξάσκηση!

money_statistics_kid_no_transactions: This month %1$d didn’t spend or receive any money
money_statistics_kid_spent_received_same: This month %1$d spent and received the same amount
money_statistics_no_money_spent: No money was spent this month
allowance_all_set_subtitle_bank_account_: We’ll remind you to pay out the allowance every %1$d.
We’ll remind you to pay out the allowance the %1$d of each month.
allowance_all_set_subtitle_piggy_bank_we: Το χαρτζιλίκι θα προστίθεται στο Gimi λογαριασμό κάθε %1$d.
allowance_all_set_subtitle_piggy_bank_mo: Το χαρτζιλίκι θα προστίθεται στον λογαριασμό Gimi στις %1$d κάθε μήνα.
allowance_currently_not_possible_to_edit: It's currently not possible to edit this
We're working on it. You can change the amount though!
allowance_reset_popover_title: This will reset the current allowance
allowance_reset_popover_description: %1$d's upcoming allowance will be deleted and replaced with the new one!
paywall_takeover_reminder_title_partner: Upgrade to Superskills Pro - free for %1$d!
paywall_takeover_reminder_title_other_co: Pro for one month for free - get access to all features!
education_paywall_takeover_subtitle: %1$d learned what bills are made of and got introduced to the basics of money. Upgrade to Superskills Pro so they can master earning, saving and spending too!
add_or_invite_child_alternative_heading: Το Gimi είναι μία εφαρμογή για όλη την οικογένεια

invite_child_send_invite_qr_code_descrip: Σάρωση κωδικού QR εάν είστε ο ένας δίπλα στον άλλον!

phone_number_already_in_use_description: It belongs to another Gimi account. Try another one!
email_already_in_use_title: That email is already in use
email_already_in_use_description: It belongs to another Gimi account. Try another one!
transaction_success_or_regret: Was it a success or regret?
click_on_child_to_enter_settings: Κάντε κλικ σε ένα από τα παιδιά σας για να εισάγετε τις ρυθμίσεις του!
chore_was_sent_out: Η μικροεργασία στάλθηκε στο παιδί σας!
chore_was_sent_out_description: Μπράβο! Τώρα έχετε θέσει την τέλεια βάση για να μάθει το παιδί σας να λαμβάνει και να διαχειρίζεται χρήματα!
widget_selector_add_to_kid_dashoard: Προσθέστε στην αρχική του παιδιού σας
widget_description_demo_account: Χρησιμοποιήστε την εφαρμογή με εικονικά χρήματα εάν το παιδί δεν έχει ακόμη τραπεζικό λογαριασμό.
widget_description_demo_account_when_ban: Παρακολουθήστε τις οικονομίες παιδιού σας με χρήματα επίδειξης. Χωρίς τραπεζικές μεταφορές, μόνο σαν ένα εικονικό tracker.
widget_selector_you_have_added_all_avail: You have added all available widgets, but we're working on new ones. Please come back later!
widget_description_chores: Ενθαρρύνετε το παιδί σας να μάθει πώς να βγάζει το χαρτζιλίκι του κάνοντας δουλειές!
widget_description_chores_for_second_par: Chores are paid out with the allowance. Set the allowance to at least %1$d to activate it!
widget_description_allowance_locked_noti: Connect a bank account or activate the demo account first!
widget_description_allowance: Καθορίστε ένα εβδομαδιαίο ή μηνιαίο εισόδημα για το παιδί σας.
widget_description_learning_progress: Προβολή της μαθησιακής προόδου του παιδιού σας, στις διάφορες εκπαιδευτικές λειτουργίες του Gimi.
widget_activation_learning_progress_titl: Ενθαρρύνετε το παιδί σας να ενισχύσει την οικονομική του εκμάθηση
widget_activation_learning_progress_bull: 40+ μαθήματα και προκλήσεις στο Superskills Adventure
16+ πρακτικές ασκήσεις που μπορείτε να φέρετε στην καθημερινή ζωή της οικογένειάς σας
Συλλογή αστεριών ως κίνητρο για το παιδί σας, για να μαθαίνει ακόμα περισσότερα!!
widget_activation_savings_goal_title: Η δημιουργία στόχων βοηθάει σημαντικά στην ανάπτυξη καλών συνηθειών αποταμίευσης
widget_activation_savings_goal_bullet_1: Το παιδί σας, μπορεί να δημιουργήσει για τις ανάγκες του, το δικό του στόχο αποταμίευσης ή να επιλέξει από την ενότητα έμπνευσής μας
widget_activation_savings_goal_bullet_2: Καθώς οι αποταμιεύσεις του αυξάνονται, θα μπορεί να ανέβει πιο κοντά στον στόχο του στο “Χάρτη των Στόχων”
widget_activation_savings_goal_bullet_3: Ακολουθώντας την πρόοδο του παιδιού σας, μπορείτε να το ενθαρρύνετε να πετύχει τον στόχο του!
widget_description_savings_goal: Για ποιό σκοπό αποταμιεύει το παιδί σας; Ακολουθήστε το εδώ!
demo_account_is_now_hidden_popover_descr: It contained %1$d. Why not screenshot this to remember?
confirm_purchase_skin_text: The amount of stars will be deducted from your total!
confirm_delete_bank_account_description: All data in the bank account widget will be deleted. You can always re-add the widget later!
quiz_result_text_failed: Ωχ όχι! Δεν πέρασες. Απαιτούνται %1$d σωστές απαντήσεις. Προσπάθησε ξανά!
quiz_result_text_failed_parent: Απαιτούνται %1$d σωστές απαντήσεις για να περάσει. Ενθαρρύνετε το παιδί σας να προσπαθήσει ξανά!
quiz_result_text_passed: Καταπληκτική δουλειά! Κατάκτησες αυτό το κουίζ και κέρδισες %1$d αστέρια.
quiz_result_text_passed_parent: Τέλεια! Το παιδί σας έχει μάθει κάποιες νέες οικονομικές δεξιότητες.
quiz_result_text_passed_no_stars: Δεν υπάρχουν άλλα αστέρια για να κερδίσεις εδώ! Μπορείς να κερδίσεις αστέρια μόνο την πρώτη φορά που περνάς.
challenge_result_text_failed: Ωχ όχι! Δεν πέρασες. Απαιτούνται %1$d σωστές απαντήσεις. Επανέλαβε την πρόκληση και βελτίωσε το σκορ σου! Μπορείς!
challenge_result_text_passed: Καταπληκτική δουλειά! Κέρδισες %1$d αστέρια. Πήγαινε στην επόμενη ιστορία για να συνεχίσεις να μαθαίνεις.
challenge_result_text_passed_no_stars: Δεν υπάρχουν άλλα αστέρια για να κερδίσεις εδώ! Μπορείς να κερδίσεις αστέρια μόνο την πρώτη φορά που περνάς
make_deposit_info_title_1: Specify the amount you wish to top-up
make_deposit_info_title_2: Choose your bank and authenticate yourself
make_deposit_info_title_3: Select account to make the payment from
make_deposit_info_title_4: Done! The payment will deposit shortly
missing_bank_account_button_text: I can't find the bank account
missing_bank_account_info_popover_title: I can't find the bank account
missing_bank_account_info_popover_desc: If the account is missing in the list it can be due to the following reasons:
missing_bank_account_info_popover_text_1: • Your bank does not support connection to youth accounts.
missing_bank_account_info_popover_text_2: • You are trying to connect a savings account. They are mostly not supported.
missing_bank_account_info_popover_text_3: • You have some technical troubles with the bank connection. Refreshing the connection can help.
transaction_details_takeover_title: Deep dive into your purchases - follow your money in a new way!
cannot_connect_to_other_child_popover_te: The contact you selected is already a gimi child user. You cannot connect to another child.
could_not_invite_all_contacts_popover_ti: One or more contacts could not be invited
could_not_invite_all_contacts_popover_te: The following phone numbers could not be invited: %1$d
cannot_connect_with_another_parent_error: You cannot connect with another parent
pfs_take_over_title_p5: Make your family goals come true with Dreams!
pfs_take_over_offer_p5: Save up for your goals in an automatic and fun way. Get the Dreams card – right now we offer you 100 kr as a starting bonus.
pfs_take_over_offer_1_p5: Download Dreams and activate the card
pfs_take_over_offer_2_p5: Enter the code “Gimi100” at sign in
pfs_take_over_offer_3_p5: Start saving and get a 100 kr bonus!
pfs_take_over_offer_disclaimer_p5: The offer is valid from 7 Sept to 7 Dec – only for new Dreams customers. The person who signs needs to be 18 years old.
pfs_take_over_offer_dreams_card_p5: The Dreams card gives you the chance to easily create savings routines and reach savings goals.
pfs_take_over_offer_dreams_card_1_p5: Get access to fun saving hacks that help you spend less
pfs_take_over_offer_dreams_card_2_p5: Get up to 500 kr cashback each month on your green choices (SJ, Blocket, Tradera)
pfs_take_over_offer_dreams_card_3_p5: Keep track of your expenses with our smart budgeting tool
feedback_intercom_popup_title: We would love to hear your ideas
feedback_intercom_popup_description: We need your input to make Gimi as good as it can be! Help us by letting us know how we can improve?

user_satisfaction_popover_button_2: I like Gimi, but I think it can improve.
rate_in_app_store_popover_description: We are very happy to hear that you enjoy using Gimi! We would really appreciate if you could give us a rating!

Εκπαιδευτικό υλικό βασισμένο σε πρόσφατες έρευνες

widget_activation_account_statistics_bul: Monthly report in a digestible format

exit_survey_popover_subtitle: %1$d, before you go. Help us understand what we could do better.
exit_survey_feedback_popup_title: We could support you with your issue
exit_survey_feedback_popup_description: We want you to have the best experience while using Gimi. If you have an issue or miss something in the app - don’t hesitate to reach out to us!

exit_survey_cancel_sub_popup_description: Your child will lose access to Bank account, Savings goal, Bonus, Family missions and Lessons.
Continue to App Store or Play Store to cancel your subscription.
